entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
